name: Alienbot Escape!
description:
Quick game made in Unity to try the platform out!

Control your trusty Alienbot to disable the turret stopping you from leaving the planet!

Type commands in the console to control your alienbot, use the XY coordinates to specify tiles.

When you've figured out how to escape, type 'launch'! There are a few different ways, try to find all three.

For example:

  • alienbot set level 9000
  • alienbot dance
  • examine 01
  • harvest 11
  • launch

Heavily inspired by a YouTube video, and changed to work with the assets I had!

Assets from Kenney Game Assets 1
Music from Bensound and FreeSFX.
